mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.no, mb.memberimg,m.content, m.sender, m.senddate,m.acceptDate, m.accepter, m.roomno FROM message m, member mb WHERE (sender = #{id} AND accepter = #{par1} AND roomno = #{roomno} and m.sender = mb.id) OR (sender = #{par1} AND accepter = #{id} AND roomno = #{roomno} and m.sender = mb.id) ORDER BY senddate asc )
mapper.insert: insert into message(no, content, sender, accepter, roomno) values(message_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{sender}, #{accepter}, #{roomno})
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where accepter = #{id} and acceptdate is null
